about_the_game:
There is an energy derived from memories, emotions, and both historical and personal values.

It’s connected to places, objects, and monuments. It’s thanks to this very energy—the Glänzen Energy—that the world’s historical memory endures.

Today, unfortunately, it’s fading away as we forget more and more quickly.

If the Glänzen Energy were to completely dissolve, the world would become an endless desolation.

We must act!

ENTER THE DRIVIUMNET

Join the Quadrivium Project and help your team preserve the world’s historical memory. How? By entering the Driviumnet! Through it, you’ll gain access to a historical simulation and relive events from the past. Stroll through the streets of Rome in 64 AD, or explore Theodoric’s Palace in Ravenna—level by level, you’ll uncover little-known episodes of history that risk being forgotten forever.

PLAY AS DIFFERENT CHARACTERS

The strength of a soldier or the skills of a blacksmith? The power of a noble or the knowledge of an intellectual? Why choose just one? Thanks to the Driviumnet, you can embody various characters and use their unique abilities to solve the puzzles within the game. Discover history and hidden plots by adopting different perspectives.

IDENTIFY THE HISTORICAL ERRORS

The situation is worsening due to Ouroboros—a criminal organization that steals the Glänzen Energy and uses it for its nefarious purposes. The only way to prevent this is to stop them from unleashing chaos by altering historical memory. They must be stopped!

By reliving episodes of the past, you can identify these errors and halt Ouroboros before it wreaks havoc.

SOLVE THE PUZZLES AND OBTAIN NEW GLÄNZEN ENERGY

Every level is a challenge; every story hides secrets. Interact with various characters and solve the puzzles in each mission. Will you be able to obtain the Glänzen Energy needed to put an end to Ouroboros’s crimes?

What are you waiting for?

Are you ready to enter the Quadrivium Project?
